ai-vv83:2.4_0: having abandoned life through that, I live.”
ai-vv83:3.1_0: “This beryl gem is made of gold,
ai-vv83:3.3_0: Explain to me for a long time.
ai-vv83:4.1_0: The student, on the following day,
ai-vv83:5.2_0: is the one who understands (of them),
ai-vv83:5.3_0: I think you’ll die in your mind!
ai-vv83:5.4_0: Do you neither give nor get the Sun?”
ai-vv83:6.3_0: but it’s not hard to pass on.
ai-vv83:7.3_0: like a turban from a sea.
ai-vv83:8.1_0: The peaceful one, who is burning,
ai-vv83:8.3_0: like a drilling the head with the wind.
ai-vv83:9.1_0: For you have plucked the dart from me,
ai-vv83:9.4_0: in which I once was mired.
ai-vv83:11.3_0: who is your son, who is your son?
ai-vv83:11.4_0: how am I to know who you are?”
ai-vv83:12.2_0: Having given up a child, the burning floor,
ai-vv83:13.2_0: You should give gifts to your own home.
ai-vv83:13.4_0: how have you come to work?”
ai-vv83:14.2_0: I’m the one who raises my own residence in my own home.
ai-vv83:14.3_0: free of doubt, free of doubt,
ai-vv83:14.4_0: the Holy One, the Happy One, who is unsponsive,
ai-vv83:15.1_0: With confident heart, full of peace,
ai-vv83:16.2_0: the result of his joined palms, the result of his deeds,
ai-vv83:16.3_0: For I too have a fault-finding mind,
ai-vv83:16.4_0: Today I swep the Buddha for refuge.”
ai-vv83:17.1_0: “Today today for refuge the Buddha, the Dhamma,
ai-vv83:17.2_0: confident in the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha.
ai-vv83:17.3_0: So too, when five trainings are present
ai-vv83:18.2_0: fine or coarse, beautiful or ugly:
ai-vv83:18.3_0: today he should not speak falsely,
ai-vv83:18.4_0: may you please your own boy.”
ai-vv83:20.1_0: to the Buddha for refuge, the poised,
ai-vv83:20.4_0: I take refuge in the Buddha,
ai-vv83:21.1_0: I quickly give up killing living creatures.
ai-vv83:21.4_0: I’m content with your own boy.”
